South Africa's captain scored an outstanding century, leading his team to victory against Bangladesh.
Bangladesh's star player had a memorable performance but couldn't secure a win for his team.
The thrilling match kept fans on the edge of their seats until the last over.
Bangladesh and South Africa have been long-time cricketing rivals, adding more excitement to the match.
The pitch condition favored batsmen, resulting in a high-scoring game.
Despite his efforts, Bangladesh's top bowler couldn't break South Africa's opening partnership.
South Africa's victory ended Bangladesh's winning streak in the tournament.
